verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H8199>Judge<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in mine <S%H8537>integrity:<s%> I have <S%H982>trusted<s%> also in the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> therefore I shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4571>slide.<s%>
Examine <S%H974><s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5254>prove<s%> me; <S%H6884>try<s%> my <S%H3629>reins<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5048>before<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> and I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in thy <S%H571>truth.<s%>
I have <S%H8130>hated<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers;<s%> and will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
I will <S%H7364>wash<s%> mine <S%H3709>hands<s%> in <S%H5356>innocency:<s%> so will I <S%H5437>compass<s%> <S%H853>thine<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> O LORD: <S%H3068><s%>
That I may <S%H8085>publish<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> and <S%H5608>tell<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> thy wondrous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I have <S%H157>loved<s%> the <S%H4583>habitation<s%> of thy <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H4725>place<s%> where thine <S%H3519>honor<s%> <S%H4908>dwelleth.<s%>
In <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> is <S%H2154>mischief,<s%> and their right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H7810>bribes.<s%>
But as for <S%H589>me,<s%> I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in mine <S%H8537>integrity:<s%> <S%H6299>redeem<s%> me, and be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me.
My <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H5975>standeth<s%> in an even <S%H4334>place:<s%> in the <S%H4721>congregations<s%> will I <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
